thread.title: 'Pretty Little Liars' actress Shay Mitchell talks with Long Island kids
thread.title_full: 'Pretty Little Liars' actress Shay Mitchell talks with Long Island kids | Newsday

author: Kidsday reporters Jenna Schanstra, Maddy Witte and Olivia Correa from Merric
title: 'Pretty Little Liars' actress Shay Mitchell talks with Long Island kids
text:
We had the awesome opportunity to meet "Pretty Little Liars" actress Shay Mitchell, who plays Emily, while she was at Barnes & Noble in Manhattan promoting her new book "Bliss." It was so interesting to talk to her about her book -- she's also known for her great acting and modeling skills as well.
We really loved meeting her and her answers to all the questions we had for her. We were all so overwhelmed and excited when we saw her. One thing that really stood out was how much she is like her character in the show "Pretty Little Liars."
She plays sports like swimming in the show and in real life. Our favorite moment was when we asked her, "What inspired you to write your book?" She said, "My fans did. All of you and the people outside waiting for me to come outside." And it was true, the fans were lined up all the way down the block.
See also 100 things for kids on LI We had such a great time and still can't believe we met Mitchell. We'll never forget this awesome time with her and we'll always remember what a nice person she is.
Coming soon: Newsday's Family newsletter, for things to do with kids, events, more.
